title: Extend the Blog API
description:
Extend the FastAPI Blog API with these features:

1. Add a 'likes' system:
   - POST /api/posts/{id}/like - Like a post (authenticated)
   - Each user can only like a post once
   - GET /api/posts/{id} should include like_count

2. Add user profiles:
   - GET /api/users/{username} - Get user's public profile
   - Include: username, bio, post_count, joined date

3. Add search:
   - GET /api/posts?search=keyword - Filter posts by title/content

hints.text: Use Depends(get_current_user) for auth. Use Query(None) for optional search parameter. Use HTTPException for errors. Store likes as {'post_id': id, 'username': user}.

commonMistakes.mistake: Allowing users to like the same post multiple times
commonMistakes.correction: Check if user already liked before adding new like

commonMistakes.consequence: Users may not find posts with different capitalization
commonMistakes.correction: Use .lower() on both search term and post content
